channel.title: blog on Chang's blog
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Chang's blog

item.title: Personal Website by Caddy
item.description: About The content is hosted in a remote github repo, and a webhook is triggered when there is a new commit. Hence, the local repo on the web server, which is set as root of the website, will be updated automatically. The home page is prerendered and as servered directly. The markdown files of blog content are built by hugo. Setup Download hugo: mkdir hugo_binary cd hugo_binary wget https://github.
